All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AntiAliasedImageButton
This AntiAliasedImageButton extends JButton to improve the quality of the image of the button.
AntiAliasedImageLabel
This AntiAliasedImageLabel extends JLabel to improve the quality of the image of the label.
AntiAliasedTextButton
This AntiAliasedTextButton extends JButton to improve the quality of the text in the button.
AntiAliasedTextCheckBox
This AntiAliasedCheckBox extends JCheckBox to improve the quality of the text of the check box.
AntiAliasedTextField
This AntiAliasedTextField extends JTextFiled to improve the quality of the text in the field.

This AntiAliasedFileChooser extends JFileChooser to improve the quality of the text in the file chooser.
AntiAliasedTextLabel
This AntiAliasedTextLabel extends JLabel to improve the quality of the text in the label.
BackendManager
This BackendManager is the principal class of the BackHand.
BinariesController
This BinariesContoller reads the binary file in the assets and extract their content in the temoprary directories.
Browser
The browser that can be used.
ButtonBox
This ButtonBox extends JPanel in order to creates the panel under the graph umage, which contains the Dynasty Wikipedia button and the Download Dynasty Graph Image.
CheckBoxActionListener
This CheckBoxActionListener implements ActionListener in order to know when a check box is selected.
CheckBoxPanel
This CheckBoxPanel extends JPanel in order to customize the check box panel.

The borders that can be used.
ComponentColor
The colors that can be used.

This ConsolePage extends JPanel in order to create a customized panel for a console.

This CreditPanel extends JPanel to customize the credit panel.
DownKeyAction
This DownKeyAction extends AbstractAction in order to manage the down-button pressing.

This DownloadDynastyImageActionListener implements ActionListener in order to manage pressing the download button.
DownloadPage
This DownloadPage extends JPanel in order to customize the download page.
DynastiesScraper
This DynastiesScraper extends WikipediaScraper in order to get the specific dynasties information from the wikipedia page.
Dynasty
This Dynasty describes all the attributes and methods of a dynasty.
DynastyTester
This DynystyTester is used to test the Dynasty class.
DynastyVisualizer
This DynastyVisualizer generates a graph from aspecific dynasty or member.

This EscKeyAction extends AbstractAction in order to manage the esc-button pressing.
FontLoader
This FontLoader it's used to load the fonts.
FontPath
The font paths that can be used.
FrontendManager
FrontendManager is the class that manage the user interface of the application.
GenerateGraphActionListener
This GenerateGraphActionListener implements ActionListener in order to manage the updating graph image.
ImageController
This ImageController manage the operation on the image.
ImageEditor
This ImageEditor takes care of making changes in the image.
ImageHolder
This ImageHolder extends JPanel in order to create a panel in which the image is shown.
ImageHolderFocusMouseListener
This ImageHolderFocusMouseListener extends MouseAdapter in order to manage mouse clicking on the ImageHolder, when it occurs, the image holder gets the focus.
ImageHolderMouseWheelListener
This ImageHolderMouseWheelListener implements MouseWheelListener in order to manage mouse wheel rotation.
ImageLoader
This ImageLoader it's used to load the images.
ImagePath
The image paths that can be used.
ImageSaver
This ImageSaver extends Thread in order to save an image within a specific thread.
InfoBox
This Infobox extends JPanel in order to create an info box panel.
JSONable
This is an interface which makes the classes that implement it serializable.
KeyBindingController
This KeyBindingController manages the movin/esc-key actions.
LauncherManager
This LauncherManager manage the execution of a launcher window.
LauncherWindow
This LauncherWindow extends JFrame to customize the launcher window.
LeftKeyAction
This LeftKeyAction extends AbstractAction in order to manage the left-button pressing.
LoadPage
This LoadPage extends JPanel in order to customize the load page.
Main
This Main class of the project.
MainWindow
MainWindow extends JFrame in order to to create the main window where visualize the various components.
MainWindowManager
This MainWindowManager manage the main window.
Margin
The margins that can be used.
Member
This Member describes all the attributes and methods of dynasty member.

This OpenMemberLinkActionListener implements ActionListener in order to manage the opening wikipedia links.

The OperationSystem that can be used.

The representation of a point with spatial coordinates.

This RightKeyAction extends AbstractAction in order to manage the right-button pressing.
RomanLiteral
The Roman literals that can be used.
ScraperResult
This ScraperResult rapresent a touple (Dynasty, Member) and implements Comparable in order to compare each instance of this class.
ScraperResultCard
This ScraperResultCard extends JPanel in order to show the search results.
ScraperRunner
This ScraperRunner extends Thread in order to run the scraping in a dedicated thread.
ScraperStatusHolder
This ScraperStatusHolder updates a variable in order to consider the scraping status.
ScrollPane
This ScrollPane extends JPanel and it's used to display a scroll pane for the search results.

This ScrollPaneController it's used to manage the ScrollPane operations.

This SearchBar extends JPanel in order to create a search bar component.

This SearchQueryController manages the dynasty/member search by the use of a query.

This SearchTester tests the search.

The SeleniumDriver that can be used.

This UpKeyAction extends AbstractAction in order to manage the up-button pressing.

This WikipediaScraper manage the scrape on wikipedia.
